Description: Terracotta relief plaque ('Melian relief') Death of Aktaion; a hound sinks its teeth in the hero's hand, urged on by the goddess Artemis.
Curator's comments: F. Stilp, Die Jacobsthal Reliefs. Konturierte Tonreliefs aus dem Griechenland der Frühklassik. RdA Supplement 29 (Rome: Giorgio Bretschneider, 2006), 165-166 no. 12. Stilp classifies the relief among his 'first block'.
Bibliographic references: Terracotta / Catalogue of Terracottas in the British Museum (623)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
